DellProcessorMetrics.description: This property shall represent the Oem properties for a ProcessorMetrics resource.
DellProcessorMetrics.longDescription: This property shall represent the Oem properties for a ProcessorMetrics resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CurrentPCIeLinkSpeed.description: The version of the PCIe specification in use by this device.
CurrentPCIeLinkSpeed.longDescription: This property shall contain the negotiated PCIe interface version in use by this device.

DRAMUtilizationPercent.description: The memory Bandwidth utilization. DRAM usage as a percentage.
DRAMUtilizationPercent.longDescription: The memory Bandwidth utilization. DRAM usage as a percentage (relative to maximum theoretical bandwidth)

GPUResetRecommendedState.longDescription: This property shall contain the GPU Reset RecommendedState.

MaxSupportedPCIeLinkSpeed.description: The highest version of the PCIe specification supported by this device.
MaxSupportedPCIeLinkSpeed.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum PCIe specification that this device supports.

NVLinkRuntimeError.description: The NVLinkRuntimeError in Which  each bit represents training error.
NVLinkRuntimeError.longDescription: This property shall contain the NVLinkRuntimeError in hexadecimal string when converted to binary, each bit represents NVLink error status. If it is 0 menas no error and if it is 1 means error exist for the respective link.

NVLinkRxThroughput.longDescription: This property shall contain the NVLinkRxThroughput in KB.

NVLinkStatusFlag.longDescription: This property shall contain the NVLinkStatusFlag in hexadecimal string when converted to binary, each bit represents NVLink flag status of recpective link. If bit is 0 then link is down ,if it is 1 then link is up.

NVLinkTrainingError.description: The NVLinkTrainingError in Which  each bit represents training error.
NVLinkTrainingError.longDescription: This property shall contain the NVLinkTrainingError in hexadecimal string when converted to binary, each bit represents NVLinkerror status. If it is 0 menas no error and if it is 1 means error exist for the respective link.

NVLinkTxThroughput.longDescription: This property shall contain the NVLinkTxThroughput in KB.

NVLinksCount.description: The NVLinksCount is count of current devices.
NVLinksCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the NVLinksCount is count of NVLinks for the current device.

PCIeRxThroughput.description: The PCIeRxThroughput shows Granularity in KB.
PCIeRxThroughput.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCIeRxThroughput Granularity in KB.

PCIeTxThroughput.description: The PCIeTxThroughput shows Granularity in KB.
PCIeTxThroughput.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCIeTxThroughput Granularity in KB.

PowerViolationDuration.description: The Power Violation Duration in nano seconds.
PowerViolationDuration.longDescription: This property shall contain the Power Violation Duration in nano seconds.

SWViolationDuration.description: The SWViolation Duration in nano seconds.
SWViolationDuration.longDescription: This property shall contain the SWViolation Duration in nano seconds.

ThermalViolationDuration.description: The Thermal Violation Duration in nano seconds.
ThermalViolationDuration.longDescription: This property shall contain the Thermal Violation Duration in nano seconds.

enumDescriptions.Reset is not recommended: Reset is not recommended for the GPU
enumDescriptions.Reset is recommended: Reset is recommended for the GPU

title: #DellProcessorMetrics.v1_1_0
